body: PyTorch BN is correct. It's the [unbiased estimator of variance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bias_of_an_estimator#Sample_variance), which is the desired one for BN. If you calculate the unbiased np std, it will be the same. See `ddof` option of `np.std`.
